---
agent: 'agent'
model: Claude Sonnet 4.5 (copilot)
description: 'Analyzes and fixes errors and warnings displayed in the VS Code "Problems" tab.'
---

Please review and fix the items displayed in the VS Code "Problems" tab.

All levels of issues (errors, warnings, and info) should be addressed. For each issue, provide a clear explanation of the problem and the steps taken to resolve it. If an issue cannot be fixed, explain why and suggest possible alternatives or workarounds.
